channel.title: 100 errors again

item.title: 100 errors again
item.dc:creator: @aznboi594 aznboi594
item.description:
@aznboi594 wrote:

Try inserting this:

public void axeRewards() { if(AxeKilled == 20) { if(AxeScore == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); sM("You have just won 10M for 20 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 1; } } else if(AxeKilled == 50) { if(AxeScore == 1) { addItem(995, 30000000); sM("You have just won 30M for 50 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 2; } }else if(AxeKilled == 100) { if(AxeScore == 2) { addItem(660, 1); addItem(650, 1); addItem(640, 1); sM("You have just won full 3rd age mage for 100 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 3; } }else if(AxeKilled == 150) { if(AxeScore == 3) { addItem(995, 100000000); sM("You have just won 100M for 150 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 4; } } else if(AxeKilled == 300) { if(AxeScore == 4) { addItem(1042, 1); sM("You have just won blue phat for 300 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 5; } } else if(AxeKilled == 500) { if(AxeScore == 5) { addItem(4084, 1); sM("You have just won a sled for 500 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 6; } } else if(AxeKilled == 800) { if(AxeScore == 6) { addItem(6818, 1); sM("You have just won a bow-sword for 800 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 7; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors again
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Just check over everything. Like, if your missing a little tiny bit, it will make it 100 errors sometimes. Make sure, that your not missing any this like, “;”. Or {. Most of the time, people forget to add those to the end.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors again
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hi guys, so as you know I really fail with brackets in Java. I get 100 errors a lot.
I was coding some rewards for the custom minigame I made and heres the code:

public void axeRewards() { if(AxeKilled == 20) { if(AxeScore == 0) { addItem(995, 10000000); sM("You have just won 10M for 20 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 1; } else if(AxeKilled == 50) { if(AxeScore == 1) { addItem(995, 30000000); sM("You have just won 30M for 50 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 2; } else if(AxeKilled == 100) { if(AxeScore == 2) { addItem(660, 1); addItem(650, 1); addItem(640, 1); sM("You have just won full 3rd age mage for 100 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 3; } else if(AxeKilled == 150) { if(AxeScore == 3) { addItem(995, 100000000); sM("You have just won 100M for 150 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 4; } else if(AxeKilled == 300) { if(AxeScore == 4) { addItem(1042, 1); sM("You have just won blue phat for 300 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 5; } else if(AxeKilled == 500) { if(AxeScore == 5) { addItem(4084, 1); sM("You have just won a sled for 500 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 6; } else if(AxeKilled == 800) { if(AxeScore == 6) { addItem(6818, 1); sM("You have just won a bow-sword for 800 axes Killed!"); AxeScore = 7; } } }
Should it cause 100 errors? If it does, please tell me how.

All help is appreciated, thanks

Read full topic
